entry.title: Do you use .cursorrules anon?
entry.summary:
Do you use .cursorrules anon?
Kevin â¨€:â€‚If you're using Cursor, you absolutely have to use .cursorrules. As a designer & frontend developer, my biggest fear is using AI to implement features that I don't fully understandâ€” features that might add easily avoidable tech debt. This is why I have Cursor automatically
